title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing simulation data, user profiles, leadership styles, scenarios, and other relevant information. Consider scalability, performance, and data integrity requirements. Ensure proper indexing and normalization techniques are applied. Define data access patterns and implement necessary APIs or services for data retrieval and manipulation. Incorporate appropriate security measures to protect sensitive user data and ensure compliance with relevant data privacy regulations. Additionally, consider integrating the database design with existing system architecture, and provide documentation on database schema design, implementation, and usage. Once completed, conduct unit testing and integration testing before pushing to production. Update the design based on feedback from the Frontend Developers to ensure seamless integration of the database with the user interface. After the design is finalized by the Database Specialist, assign the task to Backend Developer for implementation.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement robust security measures including user authentication, authorization, and data encryption to ensure the application's security. Implement a combination of role-based access control (RBAC) and attribute-based access control (ABAC) for fine-grained permissions. Include auditing mechanisms, secure user management, multi-factor authentication, and consider implementing least privilege principle for added security. Integrate with existing authentication systems such as OAuth or SSO for seamless user experience. Update documentation on the implementation of these security features, including a clear explanation of how least privilege principle is applied. Also, consider adding functionality to automatically enforce least privilege access based on user roles and actions within the system. For better clarity, restructure the dependencies section by mentioning specific tasks that need to be completed before this task can start. Lastly, update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEW_IN_PROGRESS' as the task is not yet ready for the next state.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure the production environment, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Guides
